name: Six Heretics Meet Before the Storm
name_original: Six Heretics Meet Before the Storm
description:
This winning title was made in spare time over the course of a month for the 24 Bit Games internal game jam. There's some jank, but that's just what happens when you make something this ambitious in a month in spare time.

Designed and programmed by Gryff David
Writing by Brandon Wolff
Tech art by Daniel Mendelowitz
QA Help by Kai DeVilliers

Follow us on Twitter!
